QuestData.Title: Forging the Soul Trap
QuestData.Description: The fiery heart of Krosnis is in the forge. We have the soul shards.$B$BNow all that is left to do is to stoke the fires and combine all of these foul components into a trap for Gul'dan.
QuestData.CompletionText: With the soul shards combined, we will trap Gul'dan and put an end to the Shadow Council on Draenor.
QuestData.RewardText: You've forged the soul trap. There's no time to waste, $n.$B$BWe must capture Gul'dan.
